process.name: soil_temperature_process
process.description: Updates the soil temperature profile over a day using net radiation, boundary layer conductance, and heat diffusion solved by the Thomas algorithm with sub-daily time steps.

inputs.name: physical_Thickness
inputs.description: Soil layer thickness by layer

inputs.name: physical_BD
inputs.description: Soil bulk density by layer

inputs.name: physical_Rocks
inputs.description: Rock fragments percentage by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSand
inputs.description: Sand fraction percentage by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeSilt
inputs.description: Silt fraction percentage by layer

inputs.name: physical_ParticleSizeClay
inputs.description: Clay fraction percentage by layer

inputs.name: organic_Carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon percentage by layer

inputs.name: DepthToConstantTemperature
inputs.description: Depth below which soil temperature is assumed constant

inputs.name: instrumHeight
inputs.description: Measurement instrument height above ground used for boundary layer calculations

inputs.name: nu
inputs.description: Numerical scheme weighting parameter (Crank-Nicolson factor)

inputs.name: boundarLayerConductanceSource
inputs.description: Boundary layer conductance source: 'calc' or 'constant'

inputs.name: netRadiationSource
inputs.description: Net radiation source: 'calc' or alternative energy balance from Eos

inputs.name: defaultTimeOfMaximumTemperature
inputs.description: Default time of maximum air temperature within the day

inputs.name: waterBalance_SW
inputs.description: Soil water content by layer

inputs.name: weather_Tav
inputs.description: Average annual soil surface temperature driver

inputs.name: weather_Amp
inputs.description: Annual temperature amplitude driver

inputs.name: weather_Latitude
inputs.description: Latitude for radiation and phase of seasonal soil temperature

inputs.name: clock_Today_DayOfYear
inputs.description: Current day of year

inputs.name: weather_MeanT
inputs.description: Mean daily air temperature

inputs.name: weather_MaxT
inputs.description: Maximum daily air temperature

inputs.name: weather_MinT
inputs.description: Minimum daily air temperature

inputs.name: weather_AirPressure
inputs.description: Air pressure at measurement height

inputs.name: weather_Wind
inputs.description: Wind speed at instrument height

inputs.name: weather_Radn
inputs.description: Daily incoming shortwave radiation

inputs.name: waterBalance_Salb
inputs.description: Soil albedo (shortwave reflectance)

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eos
inputs.description: Soil evaporation (potential or constrained) used in energy balance

inputs.name: waterBalance_Eo
inputs.description: Reference evaporation used for radiative penetration ratio

inputs.name: waterBalance_Es
inputs.description: Actual soil evaporation for latent heat flux in energy balance

inputs.name: microClimate_CanopyHeight
inputs.description: Canopy height used for roughness calculations

inputs.name: InitialValues
inputs.description: Optional initial soil temperatures by layer (applied on first call if provided)

inputs.name: numNodes
inputs.description: Total number of computational nodes (layers + phantom nodes)

inputs.name: numLayers
inputs.description: Number of physical soil layers

inputs.name: nodeDepth
inputs.description: Depth of each node from the soil surface

inputs.name: thickness
inputs.description: Thickness of layers including phantom nodes where applicable

inputs.name: bulkDensity
inputs.description: Bulk density by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

inputs.name: rocks
inputs.description: Rock fragments percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

inputs.name: carbon
inputs.description: Organic carbon percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

inputs.name: sand
inputs.description: Sand percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

inputs.name: silt
inputs.description: Silt percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

inputs.name: clay
inputs.description: Clay percentage by layer including phantom nodes (extended from last layer)

inputs.name: soilWater
inputs.description: Water content per layer/node (internal representation)

inputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
inputs.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil by node

inputs.name: soilTemp
inputs.description: Soil temperature by node

inputs.name: morningSoilTemp
inputs.description: Soil temperature profile captured at ~5 AM

inputs.name: newTemperature
inputs.description: Workspace for updated soil temperatures (including air and bottom boundary nodes)

inputs.name: thermalConductivity
inputs.description: Thermal conductivity by node; at air node holds boundary layer conductance

inputs.name: heatStorage
inputs.description: Heat storage capacity term per node per internal time step

inputs.name: thermalConductance
inputs.description: Thermal conductance between nodes (including air node and bottom boundary)

inputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
inputs.description: Daily-averaged boundary layer conductance accumulator

inputs.name: airTemperature
inputs.description: Interpolated air temperature for current sub-daily step

inputs.name: maxTempYesterday
inputs.description: Previous day's maximum air temperature used for diurnal interpolation

inputs.name: minTempYesterday
inputs.description: Previous day's minimum air temperature used for diurnal interpolation

inputs.name: minSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily minimum soil temperature by node (reset each day)

inputs.name: maxSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily maximum soil temperature by node (reset each day)

inputs.name: aveSoilTemp
inputs.description: Daily average soil temperature by node (accumulated over sub-daily steps)

inputs.name: soilRoughnessHeight
inputs.description: Bare soil roughness height used in canopy/roughness calculations

inputs.name: instrumentHeight
inputs.description: Instrument height used in stability and conductance calculations (adjusted to be above canopy)

inputs.name: netRadiation
inputs.description: Net radiation into soil per internal time step (shortwave + longwave)

inputs.name: canopyHeight
inputs.description: Effective canopy height (at least soil roughness height)

inputs.name: instrumHeight
inputs.description: Original instrument height parameter captured in state (if provided)

inputs.name: internalTimeStep
inputs.description: Length of internal time step in seconds

inputs.name: timeOfDaySecs
inputs.description: Current time within the day for sub-daily iteration

inputs.name: doInitialisationStuff
inputs.description: Flag indicating first call initialisation is pending

outputs.name: soilTemp
outputs.description: Updated soil temperature profile by node at end of day

outputs.name: newTemperature
outputs.description: Latest computed temperature workspace including boundary nodes

outputs.name: minSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily minimum soil temperature by node

outputs.name: maxSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily maximum soil temperature by node

outputs.name: aveSoilTemp
outputs.description: Daily average soil temperature by node

outputs.name: morningSoilTemp
outputs.description: Soil temperature snapshot at ~5 AM

outputs.name: soilWater
outputs.description: Updated soil water content (internal per-layer representation)

outputs.name: volSpecHeatSoil
outputs.description: Volumetric specific heat of soil by node for current conditions

outputs.name: thermalConductivity
outputs.description: Thermal conductivity by node; air node holds boundary layer conductance

outputs.name: heatStorage
outputs.description: Heat storage term per node over the internal time step

outputs.name: thermalConductance
outputs.description: Thermal conductance between nodes used in the tridiagonal solver

outputs.name: netRadiation
outputs.description: Net radiation into the soil at each sub-daily step (last value retained)

outputs.name: boundaryLayerConductance
outputs.description: Daily mean boundary layer conductance accumulated over sub-daily steps

outputs.name: instrumentHeight
outputs.description: Adjusted instrument height ensuring it is above canopy

outputs.name: canopyHeight
outputs.description: Effective canopy height (m)

outputs.name: airTemperature
outputs.description: Interpolated air temperature at current sub-daily step (last value retained)

outputs.name: internalTimeStep
outputs.description: Internal time step duration used for sub-daily integration

outputs.name: timeOfDaySecs
outputs.description: Time-counter within the day for sub-daily loop (last value)

outputs.name: maxTempYesterday
outputs.description: Yesterday's maximum air temperature updated at end of day

outputs.name: minTempYesterday
outputs.description: Yesterday's minimum air temperature updated at end of day

outputs.name: InitialValues
outputs.description: Initial profile stored in state after first-time setup (if provided or computed)

outputs.name: doInitialisationStuff
outputs.description: Flag set to False after completing first-call initialisation

functions.name: Divide
functions.description: Safe division with fallback value when denominator is zero.

functions.name: ValuesInArray
functions.description: Checks if an array contains at least one valid value (not 999999 and not NaN).

functions.name: Sum
functions.description: Sums values in a list from startIndex to endIndex, skipping sentinel values.

functions.name: Zero
functions.description: Sets all elements of an array to 0.0.

functions.name: ToCumThickness
functions.description: Computes cumulative thickness from layer thicknesses.

functions.name: boundCheck
functions.description: Placeholder for range checking of variables.

functions.name: kelvinT
functions.description: Converts Celsius temperature to Kelvin.

functions.name: longWaveRadn
functions.description: Computes longwave radiation using Stefan-Boltzmann law.

functions.name: airDensity
functions.description: Computes air density from temperature and air pressure.

functions.name: copy_state
functions.description: Shallow copy of state dict with list values copied by slicing.

functions.name: volumetricFractionRocks
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of rocks in a given layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionOrganicMatter
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of organic matter in a given layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionSand
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of sand in a given layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionSilt
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of silt in a given layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionClay
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of clay in a given layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionWater
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of water in a given layer.

functions.name: volumetricFractionIce
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of ice in a given layer (currently zero).

functions.name: volumetricFractionAir
functions.description: Volumetric fraction of air in a given layer.

functions.name: volumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Returns specific heat capacity constant for soil constituents.

functions.name: ThermalConductance
functions.description: Returns thermal conductance constant for soil constituents.

functions.name: shapeFactor
functions.description: Returns shape factor for soil constituents used in conductivity mixing.

functions.name: mapLayer2Node
functions.description: Interpolates layer-centered values to node-centered values.

functions.name: doThermalConductivityCoeffs
functions.description: Computes empirical coefficients for thermal conductivity based on bulk density and clay.

functions.name: doVolumetricSpecificHeat
functions.description: Computes volumetric specific heat by node and maps it to nodes.

functions.name: doThermalConductivity
functions.description: Computes effective thermal conductivity per layer and maps to nodes.

functions.name: doThomas
functions.description: Solves the tridiagonal system for heat diffusion (Thomas algorithm) and updates new temperatures.

functions.name: interpolateTemperature
functions.description: Generates diurnal air temperature from daily min/max/mean using sinusoidal interpolation.

functions.name: doUpdate
functions.description: Commits new temperatures, updates min/max/avg soil temperatures, and accumulates boundary layer conductance.

functions.name: getBoundaryLayerConductance
functions.description: Computes boundary layer conductance considering wind, stability, and radiative conductance.

functions.name: calcSoilTemperature
functions.description: Initial seasonal soil temperature profile using damped sinusoidal propagation with depth.

functions.name: calcLayerTemperature
functions.description: Layer temperature given phase lag and damping depth.

functions.name: calcSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Initial surface temperature from mean/max air temperature, radiation, and albedo.

functions.name: doNetRadiation
functions.description: Distributes daily shortwave radiation over sub-daily steps and estimates cloud fraction and vapour term proxy.

functions.name: interpolateNetRadiation
functions.description: Computes sub-daily net radiation to soil (shortwave and longwave components).

functions.name: math_sin
functions.description: Wrapper for math.sin.

functions.name: math_cos
functions.description: Wrapper for math.cos.

functions.name: math_sqrt
functions.description: Wrapper for math.sqrt.

functions.name: math_log
functions.description: Safe natural log returning large negative value for non-positive inputs.

functions.name: math_exp
functions.description: Wrapper for math.exp.

functions.name: math_pi
functions.description: Wrapper returning math.pi.

functions.name: FinalSoilTemperature
functions.description: Extracts final soil temperature by physical layer.

functions.name: FinalSoilSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Returns final surface node temperature.

functions.name: AverageSoilTemperature
functions.description: Extracts daily average soil temperature by physical layer.

functions.name: AverageSoilSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Returns daily average surface temperature.

functions.name: MinimumSoilTemperature
functions.description: Extracts daily minimum soil temperature by physical layer.

functions.name: MinimumSoilSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Returns daily minimum surface temperature.

functions.name: MaximumSoilTemperature
functions.description: Extracts daily maximum soil temperature by physical layer.

functions.name: MaximumSoilSurfaceTemperature
functions.description: Returns daily maximum surface temperature.

functions.name: BoundaryLayerConductance
functions.description: Returns the daily mean boundary layer conductance.

functions.name: ThermalConductivity_profile
functions.description: Returns thermal conductivity profile for nodes (excluding air node).

functions.name: HeatCapacity_profile
functions.description: Returns volumetric specific heat profile for nodes.

functions.name: HeatStore_profile
functions.description: Returns heat storage profile for nodes.

functions.name: Thr_profile
functions.description: Returns stored early-morning soil temperature profile.
